00089 class EffectAutoDuck: public Effect
00090 {
00091    friend class EffectAutoDuckDialog;
00092 
00093 public:
00094    EffectAutoDuck();
00095    
00096    virtual wxString GetEffectName()
00097    {
00098       return wxString(_("Auto Duck..."));
00099    }
00100    
00101    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories()
00102    {
00103      std::set<wxString> result;
00104      result.insert(wxT("http://lv2plug.in/ns/lv2core#DynamicsPlugin"));
00105      return result;
00106    }
00107 
00108    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier()
00109    {
00110       return wxString(wxT("AutoDuck"));
00111    }
00112 
00113    virtual wxString GetEffectAction()
00114    {
00115       return wxString(_("Processing Auto Duck..."));
00116    }
00117

00119    virtual bool TransferParameters(Shuttle & shuttle);
00120

00122    virtual void End();
